hint1.first: Try to move a block. How can you find out the color of the blocks?
hint1.second: Your partner may not know the color of the blocks.

hint2.first: To rotate a block, click on the block then use the right and left arrows on the keyboard to turn it. Ask your partner for the color of the blocks.
hint2.second: Watch your partnerâ€™s movement and share the color information with your partner.
